title: 10 min Morning Yoga Stretch for Beginners - Energy Boost Yoga
description:
Enjoy this energy boosting morning yoga flow great for beginners! No props needed.
❤️ Try my mobile app to get exclusive content! ❤️📱 👉 http://bit.ly/ytmobileapp
🛍️ SHOP MY MERCHANDISE, BOOKS & ONLINE COURSES 🧘👉 https://bit.ly/ywkshop

Hey yogis, you guys keep asking for more 10 minute yoga classes so I'm serving up a good one today. :) Here's a brand new 10 minute morning yoga stretch, great to do when you've just gotten out of bed. I also snuck in a bit of strengthening yoga poses in here to give you the boost of energy you need most in the early hours of the day.

No props necessary for this class but if you have a block at home you can always grab it to make some poses more accessible. This is a full body morning yoga stretch that will target all the aches and pains you may have accumulated during the night. Enjoy!

😍 MORE 10 MINUTE YOGA 😍👉 https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLW0v0k7UCVrkh5WZyHu0d0fWnaNgbmQTw

This class was filmed at Elevate Yoga in Ottawa where I teach! Come take a class with me :) https://elevateyoga.ca/


✅ SUBSCRIBE TO SUPPORT FREE YOGA ON THE INTERNET  http://bit.ly/ywkassandra
🔔 Don’t forget to click on the bell to turn on post notifications!

Thanks for watching,
Kassandra

comments: Will you guys ever tire of my 10 minute morning yoga stretches? 😂 I hope not because I love creating them! Please leave a comment and thumbs up to this video if you'd like me to make more 😍👍 (PS - I LOVE seeing your words of the day!! Keep sharing them!) ✨ MAKE YOGA A DAILY HABIT! 😍 BROWSE ALL 10 MIN MORNING YOGA 👉 https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLW0v0k7UCVrkh5WZyHu0d0fWnaNgbmQTw
for BEGINNERS? girl I nearly passed out lmao but it felt awesome 10/10
She’s so good at describing the poses I don’t even need to look at the screen
I chose the word "productive". During this time with the coronavirus and being home alone all the time. Yoga is a great way to start my day

I’m so depressed and I spent my past few weeks in bed doing nothing, when I woke up today at 3pm😅 I decided to move my body just for 5 minutes and this video helped a lot 💙💚🥹 my intention for today is to count every small step I take. I’m gonna go take a shower and go under the sun just for 5 minutes. I’m gonna have a beautiful day today☀️
